channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Not a product
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Not a product

item.title: CVE-2021-40703|2024-08-04T02:51:06.602Z -- adobe -- not%20a%20product
item.description: Adobe Premiere Elements version 2021.2235820 (and earlier) is affected by a memory corruption vulnerability due to insecure handling of a malicious m4a file, potentially resulting in arbitrary code execution in the context of the current user. User interaction is required to exploit this vulnerability.
